name: Twilio
semantic_context: Send SMS and WhatsApp messages or make phone calls
natural_language_description: 这是 Twilio 节点。主要用于: Send SMS and WhatsApp messages or make phone calls

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: sms

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: make

from.name: from
from.description: The number from which to send the message
from.natural_language_description: 参数名: From | 作用: The number from which to send the message | (必填项)

to.name: to
to.description: The number to which to send the message
to.natural_language_description: 参数名: To | 作用: The number to which to send the message | (必填项)

toWhatsapp.name: toWhatsapp
toWhatsapp.description: Whether the message should be sent to WhatsApp
toWhatsapp.natural_language_description: 参数名: To Whatsapp | 作用: Whether the message should be sent to WhatsApp | 默认值: False

twiml.name: twiml
twiml.description: Whether to use the Twilio Markup Language in the message
twiml.natural_language_description: 参数名: Use TwiML | 作用: Whether to use the Twilio Markup Language in the message | 默认值: False

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: statusCallback (值: None) - Status Callbacks allow you to receive events related to the REST resources managed by Twilio: Rooms, Recordings and Compositions
